catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 757
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: picnic set with four stacking bowls decorated with bands of flowers and foliage from each of the four seasons; sake flask created from bamboo, with bamboo leaf motif and crested flying birds; sides of caddy are decorated with wisteria; lid for stacking bowls features phoenix with chrysanthemum design; silver handle
medium: Black lacquer with gold and silver maki-e and polychrome lacquer on pearskin ground (nashiji)
title: Picnic set with plants from the four seasons
